alert.note: Alert for Giles (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 9:13PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Giles, south central Summers and southwestern Monroe Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 913 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Red Sulphur Spring, or near Peterstown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Union... Mountain Lake... Red Sulphur Spring... Cascades... Lindside... Indian Mills... and Interior. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
